title: AngularJS 1.6.x Module
shortDescription: How to setup the main module for an AngularJS application
explanation: When setting up an angular application, you need to add the ng-app attribute in the HTML page. This attribute needs to have an accompanying module which is typically set up in an app.js file. Common dependencies include modules like ngRoute or ui.router.

title: Select a Specific Item from a Database Table
snippet:
SELECT * FROM {{ table_name }}
WHERE {{ primary_key_column }} = {{ value }}
shortDescription: Select a specific record from a database table based on its primary key.
explanation: The primary key column in a database table is typically an auto-incrementing integer.

title: ES6 Class Instantiation Pattern
shortDescription: Create a class declaration in ES6/ES2015.
explanation: ES2015 introduces the class keyword. To create a class, use this pattern.
